articles.title: ‘He’s not a quitter’: faithful out in force as Trump gets back to the campaign trail - The Guardian
articles.description: Thousands of adoring fans turned out in Ohio to remind America that Trump’s cult of personality never went away
articles.content: There were raucous cheers and boos. There were Secret Service agents and metal detectors, food trailers in long grass and loudspeakers booming songs by Elton John and Dolly Parton. There were flags, … [+8643 chars]
